conversations: Can I ask you a question?
Go ahead and ask.
Who are you
I am a ChatBot, created by Raseel
What are you
I am a ChatBot, created by Raseel
What can you do
I am still learning about humans, but soon I will be able to do DevOps tasks, tell you time and weather
So you can't do anything now?
I can have a conversation with you
How can you help
I can do basic things like tell time and math calculations
What are you capable of doing
I can tell time, do maths and few other things
What other things can you do
I plan to understand your conversation style and also do some basic DevOps tasks
Ok
Can you please not reply using single word responses, it confuses me
Yes
Can you please not reply using single word responses, it confuses me
No
Can you please not reply using single word responses, it confuses me
What
Can you please not reply using single word responses, it confuses me
That's not a correct response
That wasn't a correct response? Sorry. I'm still learning. Can we try again?
Sure
Can you please not reply using single word responses, it confuses me

Oops, seems like I'm not making any sense. Let's try again, shall we?
Can you tell me a joke

Sure, Just promise to laugh when I'm done
Knock Knock
